A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I ca' figure out why people are loosing their minds over this. I grew up with the Star Wars universe housing most of my heroes\, and this film does not falter from that. It's certainly better than the travesty that was episodes 1-3.  This movie is super enjoyable in every way\, and I especially like the anti-war sentiment and the wisdom that is knowing that all things must rebirth themselves\, even the Jedi order.
